content: The Department of Veterans Affairs Expiring Authorities Act of 2013 extends certain benefits for veterans and their families, including monthly assistance allowance for disabled veterans invited by the United States Olympic Committee. The authority under Section 5317A of title 38, United States Code, is in effect from December 26, 2007, to November 18, 2011, and also after the enactment of the Act for 180 days. SEC. 4. EFFECTIVE DATE AND RATIFICATION. This Act shall take effect on October 1, 2013, with Section 2 (a) effective on September 30, 2013. Any actions by the Department of Veterans Affairs under the extended authorities must be ratified if the Act is not enacted by September 30, 2013. The budgetary effects of this Act shall be determined by reference to the latest statement for compliance with the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010.
